alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Southern Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 2:28PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Belknap and southern Carroll Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moultonborough, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laconia, Meredith, Ossipee, Moultonborough, Effingham, Wolfeboro, Tamworth, Sandwich, Gilford, Madison, Freedom, Center Harber, Brookfield, Eaton, Wakefield, Tuftonboro, and New Hampton. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 67 and 68, and near mile marker 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and northern New Hampshire.
